mapper.select: SELECT userId, questionId, isCorrect, recordTime, questionType, @roundNumber := CASE WHEN @prevTime = recordTime THEN @roundNumber ELSE @roundNumber + 1 END AS roundNumber, @prevTime := recordTime AS dummy FROM (SELECT qr.*, q.questionType FROM question q Inner join UserQuestionRecord qr on q.questionId = qr.questionId WHERE workbookId = #{workbookId} and userId = #{userId}) qr CROSS JOIN (SELECT @roundNumber := 0, @prevTime := '') AS vars ORDER BY userId, recordTime
